data.fullContent: Ted was a general practitioner for forty years. He had a popular following at his local hospital, because he had such a good bedside manner. When he had bad news to deliver to customers, he always did so diplomatically, to soften the blow. His devotion to his patients had a profound impact on people.
data.answer: 泰德做了40年的全科医生。他在当地的医院里有很多追随者，因为他对病人的态度很好。当他有坏消息要告诉客户时，他总是很有技巧地这样做，以减轻对他的打击。他对病人的奉献精神对人们产生了深远的影响。
